name: stock_key_statistics_stock
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mboum_finance.
Tool description: Mboum Finance Official API for stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds, SEC Data, news, screeners and more! 
API description: Fetches key statistics data for a given stock symbol from the MBOUM Finance API.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve key statistics data.
